ALB.Description:
Country Name: Albania
Country Code: ALB
Category: NREP

Country Name: Albania
Country Code: ALB
Category: NREP

With 45% of the total primary energy supply (TPES), Albania has one of the largest shares of renewable energy in 
its energy mix in South-East Europe.

With 45% of the total primary energy supply (TPES), Albania has one of the largest shares of renewable energy in 
its energy mix in South-East Europe.

With 45% of the total primary energy supply (TPES), Albania has one of the largest shares of renewable energy in 
its energy mix in South-East Europe.

In addition to hydropower resources, Albania also has 
abundant solar and wind resources, which are currently almost entirely untapped.

In addition to hydropower resources, Albania also has 
abundant solar and wind resources, which are currently almost entirely untapped.

Small-scale renewable assets in Albania are eligible for feed-in-tariffs guaranteed through the obligatory 
purchase of energy by the distribution system operator (DSO).

Small-scale renewable assets in Albania are eligible for feed-in-tariffs guaranteed through the obligatory 
purchase of energy by the distribution system operator (DSO).

Albania was 
one of the first countries in the South-East European region to introduce auctions for renewable energy
projects and has since successfully tendered PV projects at competitive prices.;

